career_events.notes: Wikipedia shows conflicting dates (1991-2002 vs 1994-2003). Lead paragraph and World Bank timeline suggest 1994-2003 is correct. He held World Bank CEO role 1994-2003 per source [4], and was 'first CEO' of GEF which was established 1994.
